params.tokenId: The token to claim fees for.

createPool(address,address,(int24,addres.details: 1. Creates pool. 2. Mints initial positions. 3. Registers the positions with the PositionManager.

params.positionConfigs: Liquidity position configs defining tick ranges and amounts.

returns.isToken0: Whether the agent key token was assigned as token0.
returns.pool: The address of the newly created pool.
returns.positionIds: The ids of the minted positions in the PositionManager, in the same order as provided in positionConfigs.
returns.positionManager: The address of the position manager for this pool.

decreaseLiquidityForPosition(address,uin.details: Reverts if PositionManager is not registered for the given akAddress.

params.amountIn: The amount of the swap, always positive because we are in exact-in mode.
params.isBuy: Whether its a buy or sell.
params.recipient: The address to receive the output of the swap

returns.amountInUsed: The amount of input token used for the swap.

increaseLiquidityForPosition(address,uin.details: Reverts if PositionManager is not registered for the given akAddress.

params.amount0: The amount of token0 to add.
params.amount1: The amount of token1 to add.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.isWhitelisted: whether the pool is whitelisted or not.,

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.tokenId: The position token ID to stake.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.tokenId: The position token ID to unstake.

withdrawFromAk(address,address,uint256).details: reverts if not called by owner.

akAddressToPoolManager(address).notice: Get pool manager from ak address.

akAddressToPositionManager(address).notice: Maps akAddress to its corresponding position manager.

claimFees(address).notice: Claims fees for all positions of a given AgentKey address.

claimFees(address,uint256).notice: Claims fees for provided position of a given AgentKey address.

createPool(address,address,(int24,addres.notice: Creates and initializes a new pool, then mints the provided liquidity positions.

feeSplit().notice: Fee split contract for distributing rewards between protocol and users.

operator().notice: Returns the operator of the contract.

setFeeSplit(address).notice: Sets the fee split contract for reward distribution.

setOperator(address).notice: Authorizes an operator for all AKs.

stake(address,bytes).notice: Stakes all positions for a given AgentKey address.

stake(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Stakes a specific position for a given AgentKey address.

unstake(address,bytes).notice: Unstakes all positions for a given AgentKey address.

unstake(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Unstakes a specific position for a given AgentKey address.
